item.title: World Cup Squads
item.description: A Brief History It took 116 years from the first test match but in 1987 the inaugural Rugby World Cup kicked off in the storied Eden Park; New Zealand dismantling Italy in front of 20,000 fans. Making up the invitation-only field were 16 teams of totally amateur players, almost all of whom played their club rugby on home soil. summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.
